name: PlayerListEntryHelper
description: The `PlayerListEntryHelper` class provides access to player list entries from the server's player list (tab list). This class exposes information about players visible in the multiplayer tab list, including their profile data, connection status, game mode, and cosmetic information.
overview:
PlayerListEntryHelper acts as a wrapper around Minecraft's `PlayerListEntry` class, making player list information accessible to JsMacros scripts. It's commonly used in events related to player joining/leaving, and for accessing tab list data.

You typically get instances of this class from:
- Events that provide player list information
- Methods that return player list data
- Manual iteration through the server's player list

methods.name: getUUID
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier (UUID) of the player. This is a reliable way to identify players even if they change their username.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the display name of the player from their game profile.

methods.name: getPing
methods.description: Returns the player's network latency (ping) in milliseconds. Lower values indicate better connection quality.

methods.name: getGamemode
methods.description: Returns the current game mode of the player.

methods.name: getDisplayText
methods.description: Returns the formatted display text as shown in the player list. This includes any custom formatting, prefixes, or suffixes applied by the server.

methods.name: getPublicKey
methods.description: Returns the public key data associated with the player's session. This is primarily used for secure chat features.
examples: // Example: Get public key data (advanced usage)

methods.name: hasCape
methods.description: `true` if the player has a cape enabled, `false` otherwise
examples: // Example: Check if player has cape

methods.name: hasSlimModel
methods.description: `true` if the player uses a slim (Alex) skin model, `false` for default (Steve) model

methods.name: getSkinTexture
methods.description: Returns the texture identifier for the player's skin.

methods.name: getSkinUrl
methods.description: Returns the direct URL to the player's skin texture file.

methods.name: getCapeTexture
methods.description: Returns the texture identifier for the player's cape, if they have one.

methods.name: getElytraTexture
methods.description: Returns the texture identifier for the player's elytra, if applicable.

methods.name: getTeam
methods.description: Returns a `TeamHelper` object containing information about the player's scoreboard team.
examples: Chat.log("Player is not in a team");

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a formatted string containing basic player information (UUID and name).
